description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Relative Space is a top-down dual-stick space shooter. It features a Survival mode, for 1 or 2 players, where you fight of wave after wave of attackers. It also features a 2 player Vs. mode where you can go head to head with split screen action.  With Two Game Modes, 5 vs Maps,  32 weapons, 29 perks, 21 playable ships, and 19 pickups to unlock and discover there is always something new ahead.
description.short: Relative Space is a top-down dual-stick space shooter. It features a Survival mode, for 1 or 2 players, where you fight of wave after wave of attackers. It also features a 2 player Vs. mode where you can go head to head with split screen action.  With Two Game Modes, 5 vs Maps,  32 weapons, 29 perks, 21 playable ships, and 19 pickups to unlock and discover there is always something new ahead.
